snippet: Former prime minister Alain Juppe said on Monday he had decided "once and for all" not to stand in France's presidential election, dashing the hopes of many in his conservative party whose scandal-hit candidate faces defeat....

headline.main: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists
headline.print_headline: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists

lead_paragraph: Former prime minister Alain Juppe said on Monday he had decided "once and for all" not to stand in France's presidential election, dashing the hopes of many in his conservative party whose scandal-hit candidate faces defeat.
